class DenseMotionNetwork[source]

DenseMotionNetwork(block_expansion, num_blocks, max_features, num_kp, num_channels, estimate_occlusion_map=False, scale_factor=1, kp_variance=0.01) :: Module

Module that predicting a dense motion from sparse motion representation given by kp_source and kp_driving.
